source:
workspace_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-workspace@' + storage_account
workspace_storage_temp_folder = 'inspector'
workspace_storage_temp_name = 'inspector'
curated_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-curated@' + storage_account
curated_storage_delta_folder = 'inspector'
curated_storage_delta_table_name = 'inspector'
delta_lake_table_key_column = 'Pers_No'
delta_lake_table_name = "inspector"

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType ,DoubleType
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
curated_storage_delta_table_path = curated_storage_container + '/' + curated_storage_delta_folder + '/' + curated_storage_delta_table_name

curatedInspectorSchema = StructType([
    StructField("source_id", StringType(), True),\
    StructField("pins_staff_number", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("given_names", StringType(), False), \
    StructField("family_names", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("inspector_name", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("inspector_postcode", StringType(), False), \
    StructField("active_status", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("date_in", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("date_out", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("eo_responsible", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("grade", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("FTE", DoubleType(), False),\
    StructField("Inspector_Address", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("Telephone_no", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("Work_Mobile", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("is_sgl", IntegerType(), False),\
    StructField("pins_email_address", StringType(), False),\
    StructField("emp_type", StringType(), False)
])


# or df = sc.parallelize([]).toDF(schema)

# Spark < 2.0 
# sqlContext.createDataFrame([], schema)
if not (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark,curated_storage_delta_table_path)):
    curatedInspectordf = spark.createDataFrame([], curatedInspectorSchema)
    curatedInspectordf.write.option("mergeSchema", "true").format('delta').mode('overwrite').save(curated_storage_delta_table_path)
    spark.sql("CREATE TABLE odw_curated_db.inspector USING DELTA LOCATION '{0}'".format(curated_storage_delta_table_path))

%%sql
merge into odw_curated_db.inspector target
using (select * from odw_harmonised_db.inspector ) updates
on target.source_id=updates.source_id
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET *
WHEN NOT MATCHED
  THEN INSERT *
